title: U.S. Airmen Ready For 'Godzilla' Attack, If Needed
teaser: A Hollywood version of the cult Japanese monster is hitting theaters. The Smithsonian's Air & Space Magazine asked servicemen at Kadena Air Base in Okinawa how they would fend off Godzilla.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
